data.name: additionalCredentialsWarning
data.value: To view the information on this page, you need to verify your identity.
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-SPHttp] Message to show the end user when additional credentials are required to access restricted information.

data.name: servicePrincipalNotAvaliableError
data.value: To view the information on this page, ask a global or SharePoint admin in your organization to go to the API management page in the new SharePoint admin center.
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-SPHttp] Message to show when SharePoint Online Web Application Service Principal is not available in this tenant.

data.name: graphClientInitializationError
data.value: Sorry, we couldn't make a connection to Microsoft Graph.
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-SPHttp] Message to show when the MSGraphClient cannot be constructed. MSGraphClient is a javascript SDK for interacting with Microsoft Graph's REST APIs.
